abstract: Google revealed on Monday that it had acquired a stake in Chinese community Web site Tianya.cn, indicating a foray by the search giant into social networking in the world’s second-largest Internet market.
lead_paragraph: Google revealed on Monday that it had acquired a stake in Chinese community Web site Tianya.cn, indicating a foray by the search giant into social networking in the world’s second-largest Internet market.

headline.main: Google Buys Stake in Chinese Web Site
